name: migratePersistentStore(_:to:options:type:)
desc: Changes the location and, if necessary, the store type of the specified persistent store.
declaration: func migratePersistentStore(_ store: NSPersistentStore, to storeURL: URL, options: [AnyHashable : Any]? = nil, type storeType: NSPersistentStore.StoreType) throws -> NSPersistentStore
